name: Arc Slinger

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Point-Blank Shot, proficient with sling or halfling sling staff.

sections.body: When using a sling or sling staff, you reduce your penalty on ranged attack rolls due to range by 2. Point-Blank Shot's damage bonus applies within the first normal range increment of your sling (50 feet) or sling staff (80 feet).
sections.name: Benefits

description: You can twirl your sling in a way that maximizes its effectiveness.
